overview_of_class: The course is team-taught by Professor Weil of the Slavic Department and Dr. Lyashenko of the Music School. (He lectures on Wednesdays and Fridays at 1 PM; she also teaches, conducts the chorus rehearsals on Tuesdays at 7 PM and the concert near the end of the Course.) The course will deal with Russian Operatic Music in the Context of Russian History and Culture. No previous singing experience is required; Dr. Lyashenko skillfully evokes the most beautiful sounds to the delight of the students. There is great pleasure and understanding to be gained from the intellectual depth and great passion of Russian Literature and Music.
name: Folklore, Music, Poetry
